name: Old Dads
description: Three best friends become fathers later in life and find themselves battling preschool principals, millennial CEOs, and anything created after 1987.

review.author: aissammadmoun
review.heading: This movie is real
review.reviewBody:
Lmao should have known what kind of movie this was going to be with Bill Bur in it. I haven't laughed this hard at a comedy since SUPERBAD and JUMP STREET. This movie is really fun and real. Some people may actually be offended by it, but I guess that's to be expected with Bill? So here's a heads up if you are easily offended you might as well skip this movie.

Some conversations and characters will remind you of a few discussions you have had on twitter and Reddit.

The story is definitely the weakest point but regardless the movie is quite fun. And I feel like the movie is more about the characters Than the story itself. All 3 lead actors did a very good job portraying their characters, and there's real brotherhood and chemistry between them.
